Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas enjoy a s.content: Coming to Priyanka's work front, the actress recently¬†wrapped up filming for her upcoming film, Heads of State.The 41-year-old, along with her husband Nick Jonas and daughter Malti Marie, is vacationing on the European island and savouring tranquil moments amidst picturesque landscapes.Recently, she shared a reel to announce the wrap of the film.The snap shows the actress playing with her daughter as her husband gazes softly.The snap shows Priyanka posing next to her mother Madhu and daughter Malti.

Kris Jenner buys toy Tesla Cybertruck fo.content: Kim also shared a touching tribute for her son, describing him as "sweet, smart, silly, independent." She humorously noted Psalm's penchant for sleeping, promising to one day show him an entire photo album dedicated to his naps."I‚Äôve never met someone who sleeps more than you do and one day I will show you the entire photo album I‚Äôve made of your sleeps!The post's caption read, "Happy birthday to my amazing grandson Psalm, who is truly one of the lights and loves of my heart and my life!My sweet, smart, silly, independent baby boy turns 5 years old today!

Row over Israel's Eurovision slot oversh.content: At the end of Thursday's semi-final, the 26-year-old had appeared to object to being placed beside Golan, at several points covering his face with a Dutch flag.The war in Gaza was sparked by Hamas's October 7 attack on Israel, which resulted in the deaths of more than 1,170 people, mostly civilians, according to an AFP tally of Israeli official figures.Israel's presence in the Eurovision song contest triggered fierce debate Friday amid protests in the host city, while the Dutch contestant was mysteriously pulled from rehearsals on the eve of the final.Thousands of pro-Palestinian demonstrators marched through Malmo on Thursday before Israeli singer Eden Golan made it through to the final on Saturday when more protests are expected.- A controversial entry -More controversy erupted after the European Broadcasting Union organisers announced that Dutch competitor Joost Klein had been prevented from rehearsing Friday over an unspecified "incident".

Oscars Academy, at pivotal point, launch.content: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences on Friday launched a $500 million fundraising drive, pegged to the upcoming centenary of the Oscars.Sponsors have already committed more than $100 million to the campaign, the Academy said.Named Academy100 -- ahead of the 100th Oscars ceremony, set for 2028 -- the drive is intended to diversify finances for the group, which plays a key role in fostering new filmmakers and preserving movies, as well as handing out the annual Academy Awards."The Academy will soon enter its second century, and we want to ensure that we continue to be the preeminent leader of our international film community," said Academy CEO Bill Kramer, in a statement."Some 21 million tuned in this year to see "Oppenheimer" fend off rivals such as "Barbie" to win the best-picture award.

Demon Slayer Season 4: Hashira Training.content: Fans of the series are excited to see what's next for this legendary series.Meanwhile, international fans can catch the series on Crunchyroll and Netflix.

Angelina Jolie encouraged children to av.content: The legal battle between Jolie and Pitt has been marked by accusations and counter-accusations, with each party attempting to sway the court in their favour with their claims.In the ongoing legal battle between Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt, a new set of allegations have emerged against Jolie.The latest allegations of Jolie allegedly encouraging the children to avoid Pitt during visits add another layer of complexity to the already long and complicated legal battle between the Hollywood exes.Webb, who worked for Jolie from 2000 to 2020, alleged that he was contacted by a Jolie aide named Michael Vieira, who attempted to prevent two bodyguards from testifying in Jolie's custody battle with Pitt.Despite the NDAs, one of the bodyguards, Ross Foster, expressed his intention to testify about statements he allegedly overheard from Jolie where she encouraged the children to avoid spending time with Pitt during custody visits, reported People magazine.

As Sarfarosh completes 25 years, Aamir K.content: Aamir Khan and the team of Sarfarosh gathered under one roof to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the film.While the event saw the team reminiscing about the iconic film, the film‚Äôs lead actor Aamir Khan made an important announcement about Sarfarosh 2.Well, this screening was definitely a special one, as after so long, the audience got to watch Aamir Khan's Sarfarosh on screen which is considered one of his finest performances to date.The event was a grand one which had team members of the film and eminent celebrities from the entertainment world in attendance.Aamir Khan said, "I can commit about one thing, that we will give it a really serious shot now of coming up with the right script and a right kind of film for it.

Chiranjeevi and Ram Charan dine with Ami.content: Union Home Minister #AmitShah hosts dinner for Padma awardees at his residence....A photo from the private dinner was shared online that shows Chiranjeevi and Ram¬†in a candid moment with the Union minister.Actor Chiranjeevi dined with the Union Minister of Home Affairs Amit Shah on Thursday evening after the veteran actor was honoured with Padma Vibhushan earlier in the day.News agency ANI also shared a video of the Padma awardees chatting away at the dinner hosted at the minister‚Äôs residence.Later at night Shah hosted a dinner party at his residence for all the Padma awardees and Chiranjeevi along with his family were present at the event.

Border 2 featuring Sunny Deol and Ayushm.content: "Border 2 has been in the writing stage for over a year now and the team has cracked a script that stands to the expectations that people would have from a sequel to a mammoth all-time blockbuster like Border.Border 2 will feature Sunny Deol and Ayushmmann Khurrana and is likely to be released on the big screen in January 2025.The 1997 blockbuster film Border is getting a sequel.According to a report in Pinkvilla, ‚ÄúBorder 2 is targeting to hit the big screen on Friday, January 23, 2026 ‚Äì leading to the Republic Day holiday on Monday, January 26, 2026.The film has been under the writing stage for more than a year apparently and as per reports, the team has finally got a script ready.

Vidya Vox‚Äôs comeback EP Sundari is a t.content:
Drawing inspiration from the sounds of Tamil Nadu, the style of 1970s Bollywood, and the energy of South Asian hip-hop, 'Sundari', meaning "beauty" in Tamil and Hindi, is a tribute to powerful women.About Vidya Vox

LA-based Vidya Vox draws upon her rich South Asian heritage to craft uniquely global music, blending the intricate melodies of Indian Folk and Film music with contemporary Pop music to create an irresistibly catchy sound.Despite the stigma against divorce in South Asian culture, my mother made the brave decision to leave, choosing to raise me and my sister on her own," she said."This EP celebrates her strength and pays homage to the matriarchs in my family," Vox, who was born in Chennai but immigrated with her family to the US at the age of eight, said.The EP features collaborations with Tamil lyricist Madhan Karky, music producer Shankar Tucker, and guest artists Nikhita Gandhi and Rohith Jayaraman.

Saba Qamar exclusive on her multi-layere.content: Hindi Medium actress Saba Qamar is extremely proud of her role in Pakistani drama series Mrs and Mr¬†Shameem, opposite actor Nouman Ijaz.Now that the web show Mrs and Mr¬†Shameem has premiered on Zindagi channel‚Äôs YouTube, the Pakistani actress spoke about taking up Umaina‚Äôs role as a challenge as she internalised her character‚Äôs troubles to make fiction meet reality.‚ÄùDirector Kashif Nisar commended Saba for bringing Umaina to life and said, ‚ÄúUmaina‚Äôs character cannot be easily played since there are so many emotions and feelings her character goes through, but Saba has done an excellent job in playing her role.‚ÄùOn playing a character that is multi-layered and difficult to emote, Saba said, ‚ÄúOf course this role comes with a lot of work and various emotions are portrayed by her character.The Pakistani actress plays the role of a girl named Umaina who sees many ups and downs in her life before finding balance.

Warner Bros announces new Lord Of The Ri.content: This announcement is part of Warner Bros'¬†ongoing efforts to expand the cinematic universe of Middle-earth, following the success of previous adaptations like Amazon Prime Video‚Äôs The Rings of Power prequel series.Warner Bros has officially announced a new instalment in The Lord of the Rings film series.In a statement, Serkins conveyed his excitement for the opportunity to delve back into the world of Middle-earth alongside the filmmaking team.The new film will mark the return to the beloved fantasy world created by JRR Tolkien.The time has come once more to venture into the unknown with my dear friends, the extraordinary and incomparable guardians of Middle Earth Peter, Fran and Philippa.

Srikanth Review: Rajkummar Rao is brilli.content: Apart from Srikanth's remarkable life, the movie is much more about the life of a blind person, and the challenges that one goes through in a world where people only see them as helpless beings, who are of no use on the planet.The movie tells the story of Srikanth, who was born blind in Machilipatnam in Andhra Pradesh, into a poor farmer¬† family.While we are still not over Vidhu Vinod Chopra's 12th Fail, a new Bollywood biopic is here; Rajkummar Rao's Srikanth - the movie that tells the inspiring story of a blind man who went on to become an industrialist.But at the same time, the movie delivers the industrialist's message over the stereotypical thought process that people have for blind people, that they are not capable of anything other than begging, making candles or charity.Teacher (as Srikanth refers to her in the film) is by his side from all highs to lows; from keeping him in her home to his first court case on allowing blind students to study science, to the idea of sending him to abroad for further studies after they get bored of fighting with the system over different things due to his disability.

Jeremy Allen White is back in the kitche.content: Jeremy Allen White shared the teaser of The Bear season 3¬†on his Instagram with the premiere date for the same in the caption.Check it out below:¬†The cast of The Bear is led by Jeremy Allen White along with Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ayo Edebiri, Lionel Boyce, Liza Col√≥n-Zayas, Abby Elliott and Matty Matheson.In the short teaser, Jeremy‚Äôs Carmy gazes into the camera that zooms out over Lake Shore Drive and the Chicago skyline.

Tom Hiddleston, Willem Dafoe to play lea.content: The film will be first introduced to buyers at Cannes.I have no doubt this film will resonate widely.The film will be helmed by Jennifer Peedom.According to Variety, the biopic will see Tom Hiddleston as Hillary and Willem Dafoe as the English expedition leader, Colonel John Hunt.Tenzing is written by Luke Davies will be produced by Liz Watts, Emile Sherman and Iain Canning for See-Saw Films, alongside Jennifer Peedom and Davies.

The 'real' stalker Martha Scott denies s.content: Netflix might find itself in trouble pretty soon as a woman named Fiona Harvey promises to sue the OTT giant and makers of its hit show Baby Reindeer for ruining her name and reputation.Denying what was shown on the show, Fiona Harvey, who is said to be the inspiration behind Baby Reindeer‚Äôs Martha Scott said that she never sent those emails.The ‚Äòreal‚Äô Martha Scott appeared on Piers Morgan Uncensored and said, ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt write him the emails,‚Äù denying she sent over 41,000 emails and 100 letters while allegedly stalking Richard Gadd who created and starred in Baby Reindeer‚Äì a story about an up and coming stand-up comic who starts getting stalked by a middle-aged woman.‚ÄùFiona admitted that the show does state some facts including the name 'Baby Reindeer'¬†she gave Gadd, and meeting him in Hawley Arms pub in Camden.‚ÄùFiona Harvey also complained of the show harming her interests since reporters have been hounding her since the show aired.

Viral: Sapna Choudhary's Haryanvi song f.content: ‚Äù A third comment read, "This track is a hit worldwide.Also read:¬†Miss USA 2023's resignation letter details toxic work environment and sexual harassment incidentEvery year on April 27, the Netherlands comes alive with vibrant celebrations for King's Day, or Koningsdag, in honour of King Willem-Alexander's birthday.Citizens don orange attire as a nod to the royal family's name, the House of Orange (Huis van Oranje), and as a tribute to the national colour of the Netherlands.A viral clip shows locals and tourists dressed mostly in orange and dancing to the song on the streets of Amsterdam.This festive occasion is one of the largest and most colourful in the country, particularly in Amsterdam.
